title: New Product Drop
scriptBeat: Jesse: "Behold... the Wall of Weed! Texas-style, baby!"
Camera pans across massive product display with QR codes
Liv Hana: "Every strain, every terpene profile, every COA with ISO-certified lab results."
Jesse: "That's right - scan the QR, check the science. This is what $5 BILLION legal hemp looks like in Texas!"
cta: Scan that COA! Get your certified products at ReggieAndDro.com - 21+ only!
easterEgg: Real product wall from store - references $5B Texas hemp industry
